data.description: This turn key 3 bedroom 2.5 bath pool home in Deep Creek has it all! Start saving money right away with the owned solar system- you won't believe how low the utility bills are! Tons of upgrades: new AC and ducting 2023, new water heater 2023, new roof 12/18, new ceiling fans, light fixtures, window treatments and fresh, neutral paint throughout. Thoughtful floorplan features a large foyer, dining room and living room overlooking the resort style caged pool. Spacious kitchen, split floorplan and a HUGE, versatile BONUS room. All of this situated on a private lot with no neighbors behind you. This home is sparking clean, well maintained and shows true pride of ownership.  Home warranty included!
